annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Mayor’s Rulemaking Authority Pursuant to the Detective Adviser Act of 2004 to the Chief, Metropolitan Police Department, see Mayor’s Order 2005-99, June 14, 2005 ( 52 DCR 8165).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Pursuant to subsec. (d), this section expired 2 years after September 30, 2004.
